name: Green Dot
description:
Green Dot Advertising integrates digital, print and mass media campaigns to drive brand awareness and leads for our clients. We provide everything a brand needs, making it possible for clients to steer the entire brand experience for every touch point with one agency. We offer a wide array of services from graphic design, photography, video production and website development, to a suite of marketing services including digital, content and mass media campaigns.
We distinguish ourselves not through process, but through our people. Their creative output, whether ads or campaigns reflect the unique dynamics of the agency itself: international, intuitive, insightful and sharp. Who's working on your account?
READ MORE...
